p: The first pre-culture was prepared in 20 mL medium in 100 mL conical shake flasks and was inoculated with 100 μL glycerol stock culture of C. curvatus (15% w/w, stored at −80°C). The second pre-culture with 200 mL culture medium in 2 L shake flasks was inoculated with the first pre-culture to obtain an initial OD 600 of 1. Both pre-cultures were incubated at 28°C with 120 rpm for ~24 h.
